00018 /*
00019  * DocumentWriter.h
00020  *
00021  *  Created on: 8 May, 2009
00022  *      Author: shravanm
00023  */
00024 
00025 #ifndef DOCUMENTWRITER_H_
00026 #define DOCUMENTWRITER_H_
00027 
00028 #include <fstream>
00029 #include "google/protobuf/message.h"
00030 #include "constants.h"
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace LDA;
00034 
00035 /**
00036  * Wrapper around protobuf msgs for convenient
00037  * writing of words, topics & (word,index) pairs
00038  * into word, topic, dictionary dump files respectively.
00039  * Each msg is written into a binary file in record* format
00040  * where record=(size of serialized msg,msg serialized as string)
00041  */
00042 class DocumentWriter {
00043 public:
00044     DocumentWriter(string w_fname_);
00045     virtual ~DocumentWriter();
00046     bool write(const google::protobuf::Message& msg);
00047 
00048 private:
00049     string w_fname; //The output file to write various msgs from
00050 
00051     ofstream w_output; //The output stream to write to w_fname
00052 
00053     string serialized; //The string to which msgs are serialized to
00054 
00055     /**
00056      * The main function that writes records to output
00057      * Assumes that the msg has been serialized by the
00058      * caller into 'seialized'
00059      */
00060     inline bool write_sized_record_to(ofstream& output) {
00061         LOG_IF(FATAL,serialized.size()>size_t(MAX_MSG_SIZE))<<"Writing file: Message size " << serialized.size() << " exceeds " << MAX_MSG_SIZE << ". Quitting...";
00062 
00063         size_int size = (size_int)serialized.size();
00064         output.write((char*)&size,sizeof(size_int));
00065         output.write(serialized.c_str(),size);
00066         output.flush();
00067         return !output.bad();
00068     }
00069 
00070     //The base method to write msg into out_str
00071     inline bool write_base(ofstream& out_str, const google::protobuf::Message& msg) {
00072         msg.SerializeToString(&serialized);
00073         return write_sized_record_to(out_str);
00074     }
00075 };
00076 
00077 #endif /* DOCUMENTWRITER_H_ */
